text: Atahpara nisid'dha masagulo yakhana atibahita haye yaya takhana musarikadera katala karo yekhane tadera pa'o, ara tadera bandi karo, ara tadera ghera'o karo, ara tadera jan'ya ot pete thako pratyeka ghamtite. Kintu yadi tara ta'oba kare ebam namaya kayema kare ara yakata adaya kare tabe tadera patha chere diyo. Nihsandeha allah paritranakari aphuranta phaladata.
